attributes.action: Abandon current scheme of cycle ways in roadways and allow cyclists to use all footpaths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current cycle way schemes involve mixing cyclists with traffic in a dangerous way. Cycle ways are ended just when they are needed. Parked cars force cyclists into path of traffic being funnelled into atificially small gaps causing accidents. Footpaths are underused, widespread and existing. A very quick way to extend the cycle way network instantly.
